title: Add Telemetry Data Point
objective: Learn how to modify an Electronic Data Sheet telemetry message payload definition and telemeter the value.

exercise.instructions:
1. Locate the 'DataTypeSet: Telemetry Payloads' comment block. Add the following entry to StatusTlm_Payload's <EntryList>:
    Entry name='SetParamCmdVal'
    type='BASE_TYPES/uint16'

Note the GUI needs to be retarted after building the new lesson cFS target.

1. Locate the HYUN_FIRST_Class_t definition. In the 'HYUN_FIRST State & Contained Objects' section add:
    'uint16  SetParamCmdVal;'

1. Locate the HYUN_FIRST_SetParamCmd() function added in lesson 1. Before the return line add:
    'Hyun_first.SetParamCmdVal = CmdPayload->Param;'

1. Locate the SendHousekeepingTlm() function. After the command counter lines add:
    'Payload->SetParamCmdVal = Hyun_first.SetParamCmdVal;'
